macros.sub: This is the click ID container, through which we pass each other the clicks and conversions whenever they happen. This is the most important value
macros.source: This value will report your publisher ID associated with every click ID. This is very useful for traffic optimisation
macros.sub2: Here you can pass any other extra piece of information you'd like to send
macros.sub3: Here you can pass any other extra piece of information you'd like to send
macros.sub4: Here you can pass any other extra piece of information you'd like to send
macros.sub5: Here you can pass any other extra piece of information you'd like to send
macros.currency: This value will report the currency of every transaction, for example: EUR, USD, GBP, etc...
macros.commission: This is the payout that we will report to you for every transaction
macros.carrier: This value will report the operator related to the conversion
macros.country: This value will report the country related to the conversion
